Specific heat measures the amount of energy required to change a state of matter into another. Each type of matter has one, and weâ€™re going to focus on water. Particularly water in liquid form to vapor.

Take some time (10min). and discuss it with your teammates: how would you guys do it? Do you even think a specific heat exists? Later, weâ€™ll see how you guys would do it.
